overview: In this program Lenny Magill and Jim Clark show you complete dissassembly and reassembly procedures as well as basic and advanced shooting techniques. Grip, stance, trigger control, sight picture and 4 practical shooting positions. You'll learn how to load, unload, & shoot at 25 yards to 150 yards with speed and accuracy. Plus, see the awesome firepower the AR-15 is capable of delivering, how to fieldstrip, clean and lubricate, self-defense shooting positions & much more!
title: GV: Mastering the AR-15
